metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11026 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: FontInfoScanner::scanFonts in FontInfo.cc in Poppler 0.75.0 has infinite recursion, leading to a call to the error function in Error.cc.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> stack overflow due to infinite loop, hardly a security issue needs backporting we will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu stable releases, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
